thread.title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Zhongnan Construction Unit's Consortium Wins Bid For Hospital PPP Contract

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Zhongnan Construction Unit's Consortium Wins Bid For Hospital PPP Contract

organizations.name: jiangsu zhongnan construction group co ltd
brief-jiangsu zhongnan construction unit's consortium wins bid for hospital ppp

text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Jiangsu Zhongnan Construction Group Co Ltd:
* SAYS UNIT'S CONSORTIUM WINS BID FOR HOSPITAL PPP CONTRACT WORTH 1.0 BILLION YUAN ($155.44 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2DqbxVi Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.4334 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
